name: Meteorite Command
description:
Controls:

-Move the mouse to aim

-Click to fire

-Press Number keys 1-5 to take-down shields (each number corresponds to a different shield) 

Description:

My Ludum-Dare 43-Jam entry

Inspired by the arcade game Missile Command,    You aim to shoot at meteorites that are falling from the sky.  Cities have shields that  have a 75% chance  of reflecting  meteorites (the shields  are especially vulnerable from the sides)   Every shot takes power.  The only way to regain power is to permanently take down one of the shields for your cities.   How long can you survive?

Credits:

Game  by Zachary Morris

Music by Tristan Weigand
